name: Seers Isle
description: Seers Isle is a narrative game, set in a fantasy version of medieval northern Europe, where your choices impact the fate of a group of characters.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: 2.0 Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated or dedicated graphic card with 512MB of VRAM Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: 2.6 Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated or dedicated graphic card with 512MB of VRAM Storage: 1 GB available space
